verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Sinners Jesus will receive; Sound this word of grace to all Who the heav'nly pathway leave, All who linger, all who fall.

verse.name: c
v2
v3
verse.lines: Now my heart condemns me not, Pure before the law I stand; He who cleansed me from all spot, Satisfied its last demand.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Christ receiveth sinful men, Even me with all my sin; Purged from every spot and stain, Heav'n with Him I enter in.
